info.name: Guitar Tab Viewer
info.summary: View and play Guitar Pro tablature files with built-in audio playback
info.description:
Guitar Tab Viewer allows you to open Guitar Pro files (.gp, .gp3, .gp4, .gp5, .gpx, .gp7) directly in your Nextcloud Files interface.
## Features
- **Professional rendering**: High-quality tablature display using alphaTab - **Audio playback**: Built-in MIDI synthesizer with SoundFont - **Interactive controls**: - Play/Pause/Stop controls - Visual cursor tracking during playback - Click on progress bar to jump to any position - Adjustable zoom (30% - 250%) with real-time slider - **Multi-track support**: Select and display individual tracks - **Seamless integration**: Opens in overlay without leaving Files app - **Keyboard shortcuts**: Close with Escape key
Perfect for musicians who want to manage and view their Guitar Pro files in their self-hosted Nextcloud instance.
## Supported Formats
.gp, .gp3, .gp4, .gp5, .gpx, .gp7
